Congratulations IA-Webteam,

this release includes loads of fine bugfixes/f=
eatures, but
unfortunatly there seems to be one major glitch:
Creating WARC=
 files (either v10 or v12) is seriously broken and rather
quickly results i=
n "Too many open files". 
See [HER-1102] for more informations about the is=
sue.

I'm confident that you guys will solve this issue rather soon...

Reg=
ards
  Olaf Freyer

stack@...> wrote:
>
> This note is to announce the release of Heritrix 1.12=
.0.  It is

net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=3D73833.

nctionality. In this release, the theme

ng sites at regular intervals. A number

xes are also included.   Please see the

ttp://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes/1_12_0.html
